events.title: Regen 2023
events.description: The premier UK Smash Ultimate tournament is back, this time for 3 DAYS!

events.title: Tech Republic VII
events.description: Spain's well established Smash Bros. Ultimate Major in Barcelona returns with its 7th edition featuring a capacity of 600+ players.

events.title: Arcamelee #4
events.description: Arcamelee is fruits of a strong partnership between the local Melee community and the Arcaneum gaming bar. Some of the greatest players from around the world like Cody Schwab and moky will be attending this edition. There's a cap op 256 players.

events.title: Vienna Challengers Arena 2023
events.description: Since 2017 Vienna Challengers Arena has been a big part of VIECC¬© Vienna Comic Con and its Super Smash Bros competitions established itself as one of the biggest tournaments in the German-speaking region! This year's edition has a capacity for 512 Smash Bros. Ultimate participants. Partcipation includes access to the entire Vienna Comic Con.

events.title: Ultimate Fighting Arena 2023
events.description: One of the most prestigious fighting game events in the world makes it return with another 3 day event featuring Smash Bros. Ultimate and various other Fighting games.

events.title: Valhalla IV
events.description: By joining forces with PXB, Scandinavia's most exciting Smash tournament makes a return at the N√∏rrebrohalle with a 4 day event that offers Singles and Doubles competitions for Melee and Ultimate and various FGC side events. There's room for 512 players.

events.title: King Con
events.description: With 3 floors and a capacity for 1024 players King Con is looking to bring all of the biggest names in Europe under one roof for a one-of-a-kind experience that's never been seen before in partnership with Villette eSport Festival. Competitions: 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2 and Squad Strike.

events.title: Grand Conquest 2024
events.description: StreetSmash Manchester(SSM) are highly experienced organisers of Smash Bros. events, having organised events in the North West of England since 2015. They bring you a 2 day Ultimate major with a capacity for 256 players, singles / doubles competitions, a Chaos Bracket and venue pub quiz(18+).
